title: Home Soil Test Kits | From the Ground Up

tasks.task: Soil testing using home kits or sending samples to a lab.
subtasks: Sending soil sample to a lab for analysis (if choosing that option).
Using a home soil testing kit.
Mixing soil, water, and reagents in a tube.
Comparing the resulting color to a provided card or chart.
Determining soil pH, phosphorus, nitrogen, and potassium levels from the test results.

tasks.task: Purchasing a home soil testing kit.
subtasks: Locating garden stores or ordering online.

tasks.task: Applying test results to garden needs.
subtasks: Adjusting pH based on test results.
Adding necessary fertilizers as per the test recommendations.
